scripts.test:cucumber:json: npm run ensure:results && npx cucumber-js --format json:results/cucumber-raw.json --parallel 1 tests/features
scripts.test:local: npx rimraf results && npm run test:cucumber:json && npm run merge:cucumber && npm run convert:cucumber
scripts.testmo:run: npm run test:local && npx testmo automation:run:submit --instance https://rightsline.testmo.net/ --project-id 14 --name "Playwright Local Run" --source local --results results/cucumber.xml
scripts.testmo:submit:single: npx rimraf results/* && npx testmo automation:run:submit --instance https://rightsline.testmo.net/ --project-id 14 --name "RevenueAllocationA Local Run" --source local --results results/cucumber.xml -- node ./scripts/run-cuke-and-convert.js --features "tests/features/RevenueAllocationA.feature"
scripts.testmo:submit:cuke: npx testmo automation:run:submit --instance https://rightsline.testmo.net/ --project-id 14 --name "BDD Local Run" --source local --results results/cucumber.xml -- node ./scripts/run-cuke-and-convert.js --features "tests/features"
scripts.test:clean: npx rimraf allure-results allure-report results || echo clean
scripts.test:run: npm run test:clean && npx playwright test --reporter=line,allure-playwright
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.test:allure: npm run clean:reports && npx playwright test --reporter=line,allure-playwright
